text:
Kevyn Aucoin‚Äôs new metallic lipsticks will give your lips an otherworldly glow If, for whatever reason, you‚Äôve yet to try Kevyn Aucoin‚Äôs makeup ‚Äî be it mascara, foundation, or lipstick ‚Äî then you need to treat yo‚Äôself to an afternoon at Sephora, friends. Not only are their products insanely high-end and well made , but they‚Äôre unbelievably beautiful ‚Äî just like his new, stunning, metallic lipsticks ! The Kevyn Aucoin summer collection is poised to be all about metallic lips and holographic top coats, ensuring that you‚Äôll be in full unicorn-mode for the foreseeable future .
You know us, if it‚Äôs got an otherworldly shimmer then we are totally on board! And since this is Kevyn Aucoin we are talking about, this is not going to be your everyday metallic liquid lipstick. This is an elevated and classy collection that will only enhance your natural beauty and make you feel like an IRL supermodel.
The Molten Lip Color Molten Metals are available in six different shades for $30, each. Available NOW! LINK ‚û° BIO Online @kevynaucoin #Summer2017 ‚òÄÔ∏è‚ú® #Collection All about the #Metallic Lips and #Holographic Topcoats ü¶Ñ‚ú® 1. New Line -The Molten Lip Color #MoltenMetals ‚Äì A metallic lip color, creamy, pigmented and not sticky. In 6 different shades! Titanium / Gold / Copper / Bronze / Rose Gold / Carbon. U can apply it alone or on top of a lipstick to add a metallic finish $30 Each 2. The Molten Lip Color Topcoat in 2 shades : Cyber Opal / Cyber Sky They are sheer and will add a holographic touch to your natural lip color or lipstick $30 Each 3. The Neo #SettingPowder and it‚Äôs special cause it has 3!!!! Different finishes Going from Matte on one side, Satin in the middle and Glow on the other side $58 What did you get? XO ‚ú® #Trendmood #cosmetics #lips #lip #lotd #motd #wakeupandmakeup #lipart #makeup #makeuptalk #makeupporn #makeuptutorial #makeupblogger #beauty #beautyblogger 
A post shared by TRENDMOOD (@trendmood1) on Mar 14, 2017 at 10:55am PDT 
The shades are called Titanium, Gold, Copper, Bronze, Rose Gold, and Carbon. You can use it on its own or apply one of two Molten Lip Color Topcoats: Cyber Opal, or Cyber Sky!
The Molten Lip Color Topcoats are sheer and will add a holographic touch to either your natural lips or your lipstick if you choose to layer it on. The Topcoats also retail for $30, each. These gorgeous new lipsticks are available now , and you can expect to receive them towards the end of the month!
Shall we take a look at these beautiful shades?
Molten Lip Color Molten Metals 1. Rose Gold Kevyn Aucoin 
2. Copper Kevyn Aucoin 
3. Titanium Kevyn Aucoin 
4. Gold Kevyn Aucoin 
5. Bronze Kevyn Aucoin 
6. Carbon Kevyn Aucoin 
Molten Lip Color Top Coats 1. Cyber Opal Kevyn Aucoin 
2. Cyber Sky Kevyn Aucoin Wowza! Talk about luminescent!
This is an absolutely lovely collection, and we‚Äôre so glad to see we can order these to make sure they‚Äôre are ours. We love how versatile the lip colors are and can only imagine all the different color combinations that will be a blast to experiment with! Head on over to Kevyn Aucoin and check them out for yourself!
